sentences.sContent: His brilliance renders this film an indubitable classic.
sentences.sCn: 他的出色表现让这部电影成为了毋庸置疑的经典。

remMethod.val: in(不) + dub(不确定的) + it + able → 不容置疑的

words.tran: 无疑地，不容置疑地，不容置疑地

trans.tranCn: 不容置疑的, 确实的, 明白的
trans.tranOther: You use indubitable to describe something when you want to emphasize that it is definite and cannot be doubted
